name: Inspector Detective: Private Eye
description:
Everyone in town has their version of what happened at Timmons Manor. None of them were there. Everyone has their theories about why a Timmons relative has not been able to set foot on the property in 100 years. None of them are correct. Explore, converse, find clues, and solve puzzles in this short, quirky, single-player, puzzle adventure. Can you solve the cold case of Timmons Manor?


Features
-Play in one sitting
-Explore the Timmons Manor and its grounds
-Converse with its ghostly inhabitant
-Find clues to solve puzzles and advance the story
